msgSnippet: Rule of a thumb: do not test methods, tests classes responsibility/behaviour. If you follow this rule, you won t have to find names for overloaded methods, but

Rule of a thumb: do not test methods, tests classes
responsibility/behaviou=
r. If you follow this rule, you won't have to find
names for overloaded met=
hods, but for different responsibilities that each
of them should represent=
.
